text: vēdakkār ninnēāṭ āvaśyappeṭunnu; nī avarkk ākāśatt ninn oru granthaṁ iṟakkikeāṭukkaṇamenn‌. ennāl atinekkāḷ gurutaramāyat avar mūsāyēāṭ āvaśyappeṭṭiṭṭuṇṭ (atāyat‌) allāhuve ñaṅṅaḷkk pratyakṣattil kāṇiccutaraṇaṁ ennavar paṟayukayuṇṭāyi. appēāḷ avaruṭe akramaṁ kāraṇaṁ iṭittī avare piṭikūṭi. pinne vyaktamāya teḷivukaḷ vannukiṭṭiyatin śēṣaṁ avar kāḷakkuṭṭiye (daivamāyi) svīkariccu. enniṭṭ nāṁ at peāṟuttukeāṭuttu. mūsāykk naṁ vyaktamāya n'yāyapramāṇaṁ nalkukayuṁ ceytu
